audios.au: The ECAS ECU for trailers is an universal ECU and is provided in two variants only, which look nearly the same: as standard variants for all ABS trailers and as variant for trailers with the Electronic Brake System EBS.
Behind the base plate with the plugin-connections for all connected ECAS components and for power supply the actual electronics are located, which are not accessable.
Normally the ECU does not need to be opened, only when it is installed, during changes of the system configuration or to check the current paths.
